descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kevin Durant knocks down his jump shot despite good defense by PJ Tucker.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD drills pull-up jumper over Tucker) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD drills pull-up jumper over Tucker

videos.description: After the play is blown dead, Blake Griffin throws up a rainbow shot over his head that swishes through the net.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blake Griffin hits circus shot after the whistle) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Griffin hits circus shot after the whistle

videos.description: Kyle Lowry draws an extra defender and tees up Bam Adebayo for an alley-oop.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lowry lobs to Bam for alley-oop slam) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lowry lobs to Bam for alley-oop slam

videos.description: James Harden connects on his 3-point attempt despite being fouled by Duncan Robinson.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden splashes step-back triple for 4-point play) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden splashes step-back triple for 4-point play

videos.description: Bruce Brown tries to score in the paint, but Duncan Robinson has other ideas.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Duncan Robinson denies Bruce Brown at the rim) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Duncan Robinson denies Bruce Brown at the rim

videos.description: James Harden lobs to Blake Griffin, who elevates over Kyle Lowry for the hoop and the harm.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Blake Griffin turns back clock with and-1 alley-oop) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Blake Griffin turns back clock with and-1 alley-oop

videos.description: Bam Adebayo goes to work in the post for a tough basket through contact.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Bam overpowers Millsap for and-1 bucket) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Bam overpowers Millsap for and-1 bucket

videos.description: Miami Heat vs. Brooklyn Nets: Full Highlights

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Miami Heat vs. Brooklyn Nets: Full Highlights) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Miami Heat vs. Brooklyn Nets: Full Highlights

videos.description: Jimmy Butler racks up 17 points, 14 rebounds, seven assists, four steals and a block in the Heat's 106-93 win vs. the Nets.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Jimmy Butler stuffs the stat sheet as Heat topple Nets) 2021/10/27 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jimmy Butler stuffs the stat sheet as Heat topple Nets
